titles.title: Insuring Families for Their Future Act of 2007
Insuring Families for Their Future Act of 2007
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the dollar limitation on employer-provided group term life insurance that can be excluded from the gross income of the employee.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Insuring Families for Their Future Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase from $50,000 to $320,000 the amount of employer-provided group term life insurance that an employee can exclude from gross income. Indexes the $320,000 amount for inflation for taxable years beginning after 2007.
